title: Font for a corporate identity
content:
Hi my name's David :)

I've been trying for hours to figure out what font this is. I hope anyone can help me. I'm currently designing a corporate identity for a client and that's the font I've been searching for!

- David

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172235im_/http:/typophile.com/files/s_4221.jpg)

Font: 

 Neutra Display 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172235/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: davidbenzur

comments.content:
After getting this wrong on another post earlier, a chance to redeem myself--Neutra Display Bold, by House Industries:

[http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317172235/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface "http://www.houseind.com/fonts/neutraface")
